properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 1:30AM CST until January 11 at 2:30AM CST by NWS Shreveport LA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Western Union County in south central Arkansas...
Southern Columbia County in southwestern Arkansas...
Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana...
Central De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana...
Northwestern Union Parish in north central Louisiana...
Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana...
North central Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana...
Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana...
Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana...
Eastern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana...
Western Lincoln Parish in north central Louisiana...

* Until 230 AM CST.

* At 130 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from Springhill to near Cotton Valley to 10 miles south
of Doyline to near Mansfield, moving east at 45 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Minden, Springhill, Mansfield, Homer, Junction City, Arcadia,
Haynesville, Ringgold, Sibley, Cullen, Cotton Valley, Gibsland,
Sarepta, Doyline, Taylor, Emerson, Dixie Inn, Dubberly, Heflin and
Shongaloo.
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for south central
and southwestern Arkansas...and northwestern Louisiana. A Tornado
Watch also remains in effect until 800 AM CST for north central and
northwestern Louisiana.

Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly
from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the
basement or small central room in a sturdy structure.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.
